trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when an error condition occurs during the opening, accessing, or using of a [PrintDialog](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 액세스 또는 사용 하 여는 동안 오류 조건이 발생할 때 throw 되는 예외는 [PrintDialog](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PrintDialogException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PrintDialogException"></xref> class that provides a specific error condition in a <xref:System.String> .
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PrintDialogException"> </xref> <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String> 특정 오류 조건을 제공 하는 클래스

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the error condition.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PrintDialogException"></xref> class that provides specific <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PrintDialogException"> </xref> 특정 제공 하는 클래스 <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> 및 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: The data that is required to serialize or deserialize an object.
trans-unit.target: Serialize 하거나 개체를 역직렬화 하는 데 필요한 데이터.

trans-unit.source: The context, including source and destination, of the serialized stream.
trans-unit.target: 원본 및 대상 serialize 된 스트림의 포함 하는 컨텍스트.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PrintDialogException"></xref> class that provides a specific error condition, including its underlying cause.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PrintDialogException"> </xref> 내부 원인을 포함 하는 특정 오류 상태를 제공 하는 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> that describes the error condition.
The underlying error condition that caused the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PrintDialogException"></xref>.
